name: trimcate
description: convert long text into a previewable short text with with a start length and an end length

scripts.prepublish: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.precommit: npm run lint && npm run build
scripts.tag: npm version minor --no-git-tag-version && npm run build && PACKAGE_VERSION=$(cat package.json | grep version | head -1 | awk -F: '{ print $2 }' | sed 's/[",]//g' | tr -d '[[:space:]]') && git commit -am "$PACKAGE_VERSION release" && git tag v$PACKAGE_VERSION
scripts.patchTag: npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && npm run build && PACKAGE_VERSION=$(cat package.json | grep version | head -1 | awk -F: '{ print $2 }' | sed 's/[",]//g' | tr -d '[[:space:]]') && git commit -am "$PACKAGE_VERSION release" && git tag v$PACKAGE_VERSION

author: Raoul Kramer
